rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual statistics without using high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment discusses export percentage and industry use (financial/trade metrics), which are treated as Neutral per rules.
The segment reports export percentage and industry use but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser ('only', 'just', 'merely', 'a single', 'few') combined with an explicit scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes export percentage and industry use, not capabilities or preparedness.
Reports the numerical metric of production exported ('Almost 18 percent... is exported') using standard description.
